title: Gene, DNA and Chromosomes
question: Basic hereditary unit / Unit asas pewarisan
Made up of basic unit known as nucleotides / Terdiri daripada unit unit asas yang dikenali sebagai nukleotida
Fine thread like structures / Struktur berbenang halus
人类的 Chromosome / Kromosom 有
A: 22 个 autosome + 2 个 Sex chromosome / Kromosom seks
B: 44 个 autosome + 2 个 Sex chromosome / Kromosom seks
C: 22 个 autosome + 1 个 Sex chromosome / Kromosom seks
D: 44 个 autosome + 1 个 Sex chromosome / Kromosom seks
